title: Context Team: Roles, Context Groups, and ACLs
summary: Understand context roles ↔ context groups, Team Members aggregation, and applying ACLs.

steps.label: Open Team page
steps.action: Review Members table (roles mapped to users/groups).

steps.label: Add/remove roles
steps.action: Actions → Add Roles (only what you need); remove unused roles in templates for new contexts.

steps.label: Apply ACLs via Policy Administration
steps.action: Write rules to context roles or generated context groups; Team Members is a superset of all non‑Guest members.
steps.verify: Access behaves as expected for different roles.
